name: Mad Driver (itch)
description:
Thought this drive would be simple?  Think again...

You're driving down the road in your car. Avoid the obstacles coming at you and get the highest score you can.

A FEW NOTES:

- The game you see here is only a demo, and there will be many improvements to it in the future. Got any suggestions? Send me a message!

- This is the first game I've ever published, so there's certainly going to be some issues. Got problems with the game? Send me a message!

- Liking this game? Support development and future projects by donating!

- FOR WINDOWS 11 USERS: this game was developed and tested entirely in Windows 10, so I'm not sure if it's compatible with the latest Windows OS. Encountering any problems? Send me a message!

CREDITS

Made by ldebont.

Developed and tested in Windows 10 using Visual Studio (MonoGame).

Music made using LMMS.
